mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum ,board_num,id,category_id,content,write_date,recommend_num,report_num,screp,comment_num from ( select * from board ORDER BY write_date DESC ) board ORDER BY write_date DESC) where rnum between 1 and 3 ORDER BY write_date DESC
